titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, X temple, time of X, year X

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
svasti śrī : ti ti kōṉēriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ āryā varttattu śrī goḷaki vamsattu śrīmal lakṣādyāyi santāṉattu śrī
deśikēndra pra va rāvaḷaṟku tām puṟamalai nāṭṭut tirukkoṭuṅkuṉṟattu uṭaiyār tirukkoṭuṅkuṉṟamuṭaiyār
tirukkāmak taruvil ceyvitta śrī pārvati maṭattu vattikkum tam santāṉattu tapasvikaḷukku bhojaṉam uḷḷuṭṭu vēṇ
ṭuvaṉavukku ṭṭu nāṭa maṅkalam nāṉ kellaik kuṭpaṭṭa nīr nilamum nañcey puṉceyyum nattamum tōṭṭamum kuḷa
muṅ kuḷapparip til paḻantēvatāṉam paḷḷiccantam nīkki nīkki uḷḷa nilam muṉṉuṭaiyārum uḻavu mutalun tavirttu
k kārāṇ ntarāyamum viṉiyōhamum taruvatāṉa accum kāriya vārāycciyum veṭṭi pāṭṭam pañcupili sandhivi
grahap pēṟu ṟiyiṟaiyum maṟṟum eppēṟpaṭṭaṉavum uṭpaṭa eṭṭāvati ṉetirā māṇṭi ṉetirā
ṇṭu mutal pāka iṭappeṟavēṇumeṉṟu aiyaṉ maḻavarāyar namakkuc coṉṉamaiyil nām ittirukkoṭuṅ
kuṉṟamuṭai āṭṭap perunteruviṟ ceyvitta śrīpārvati maṭattu varttikkum tam santāṉattu tapasvikaḷukku bho
jaṉam uḷḷu vattukku vikramarāma vaḷanāṭṭu nāṭamaṅkalam nāṉkellaikkuṭpaṭṭa nīrnilamum karuñcey puṉ
ceyyum na m kuḷamum kuḷapparippum uṭpaṭṭa nilattup paḻantēvatāṉam paḷḷiccantam nīkki nīkki uḷḷa nila
m muṉṉu talun tavittuk kārāṇmai mīyāṭciyum antarāyamum viṉiyōhamum taruvatāṉa accum kāriyavā
cciyum veṭa cu pīli sandivigrahap pēṟum maṟṟum eppēṟpaṭṭaṉavum uṭpaṭa ivvāṇṭu mutal maṭappuṟa iṟaiyi
liyāka iṭ ṭṭa uḻvariyum nam kēḻviyum tarac coṉṉōm kaikkoṇṭu ippaṭi candrāditvat celvatāka kallilum
cempilum kāḷka ivai arumpoṟ kūṟṟattup putappērk kuḷattu āḻvāṉ āṇṭapirāṉ aḻakaṉāṉa aḻakiya pāṇṭiya
viḻupparaya -e vaḷakata U ya A {symbols} ivai aṇṭa nāṭṭup perumaṇalūr arayaṉ muṭivaḻaṅkum perumāḷāṉa vikrama pāṇṭiya uttarama
ntari eḻuttu kai nāṭṭuc cakkarapāṇinallūr arayaṉ virata muṭittā(ṉāṉa) pallava rāya ṉeḻuttu u
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Review and updates (based on photos by N. Ramaswamy), encoding, critical apparatus and translation by Emmanuel Francis (2024).
